name: Tower of the Scorched Sea
description:
Explore an ancient tower and reach the top by solving its many tricky puzzles and avoiding its countless deadly hazards.

What was once, long ago, an ocean full of life and lush islands, at some point became an extremely dry and hot salt plain. At the very center of this plain stands a small, mysterious tower. Rumors have it that it is somehow connected to the transformation of a beautiful ocean to the uninhabitable expanse it is today. One very adventurous explorer may have also heard some rumors about a priceless ancient prism resting at the top...

This is the sequel to Temple of the Four Serpents (although they can be played completely separately).

CONTROLS
- Left and right arrow keys/A and D: Move left and right
- Z/K/Up arrow key/W: Jump
- Down arrow key/S: Crouch
- R: Restart from latest checkpoint
- P/Escape: Pause game
- M: Mute game
